goal.title: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

indicators.title: Share of the population whose average per capita equivalent total expenditure is lower than the actual (estimated) subsistence minimum, %
Share of individuals whose daily consumption is below USD 5.05 PPP, %
Share of the poor population covered by state social support in the total number of poor people, %
Ratio of poverty levels of households with children and households without children, times
Share of food expenditure in total household spending, %

goal.title: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

indicators.title: Prevalence of undernourishment
Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
global_indicators.2-1-3-title
global_indicators.2-1-4-title
global_indicators.2-1-5-title
Prevalence of stunting (height for age <-2 standard deviation from the median of the World Health Organization (WHO) Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age
Prevalence of malnutrition (weight for height >+2 or <-2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age, by type (wasting and overweight)
Volume of production per labour unit by classes of farming/pastoral/forestry enterprise size
Average income of small-scale food producers, by sex and indigenous status
global_indicators.2-3-3-title
Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture

goal.title: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

indicators.title: Maternal mortality ratio
Under‐5 mortality rate
Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
Tuberculosis incidence per 100,000 population
Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease
Suicide mortality rate
global_indicators.3-4-3-title
global_indicators.3-4-4-title
Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders
Alcohol per capita consumption (aged 15 years and older) within a calendar year in litres of pure alcohol
Death rate due to road traffic injuries
global_indicators.3-6-2-title
Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15–49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods
Coverage of essential health services
Proportion of population with large household expenditures on health as a share of total household expenditure or income
Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution

goal.title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

indicators.title: Proportion of children and young people (a) in grades 2/3; (b) at the end of primary; and (c) at the end of lower secondary achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in (i) reading and (ii) mathematics, by sex
Completion rate (primary education, lower secondary education, upper secondary education)
Proportion of children aged 24-59 months who are developmentally on track in health, learning and psychosocial well-being, by sex
Participation rate of youth and adults in formal and non-formal education and training in the previous 12 months, by sex
Proportion of youth and adults with information and communications technology (ICT) skills, by type of skill
global_indicators.4-4-2-title
global_indicators.4-4-3-title
global_indicators.4-4-4-title

Parity indices (female/male, rural/urban, bottom/top wealth quintile and others such as disability status, indigenous peoples and conflict-affected, as data become available) for all education indicators on this list that can be disaggregated
global_indicators.4-5-2-title
Proportion of population in a given age group achieving at least a fixed level of proficiency in functional (a) literacy and (b) numeracy skills, by sex

Extent to which (i) global citizenship education and (ii) education for sustainable development are mainstreamed in (a) national education policies; (b) curricula; (c) teacher education; and (d) student assessment

global_indicators.4-7-3-title

goal.title: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

indicators.title: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‐discrimination on the basis of sex

Proportion of ever-partnered women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to physical, sexual or psychological violence by a current or former intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by form of violence and by age
Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence

goal.title: Reduce inequality within and among countries

indicators.title: Ratio of growth rate of the average per capita total income of the least well off 40% to the whole population, %
Share of total income of the least well off 40% in the total income of population, %
Share of persons who reported that in the past 12 months they personally experienced gender-based discrimination in the total number of requests to expert councils on gender-based discrimination, %
Share of rural households who suffered from deprivation due to lack of access to ambulance services in the settlement, %
Share of rural households who suffered from deprivation due to the lack of a medical facility near their home, %
Share of rural households who suffered from deprivation due to the lack of regular daily transport to another settlement with developed infrastructure, %
Ratio of the average wage (income) of 10th and first decile groups of workers (decile coefficient), times
Ratio of average pension to average wage in the economy (with 35 years of insurance experience), %

goal.title: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

indicators.title: Solvency ratio of the borrower (ratio of monthly payments of the borrower and his/her family on mortgage debt servicing to total monthly income)
Coverage of territorial units of Ukraine (regions) with affordable housing programs for different categories of citizens, %
Share of regions that have approved and implemented regional development strategies and action plans for their implementation developed with public participation, %
Number of cultural and natural heritage sites included in the UNESCO World Heritage List, units
Number of monuments of national importance included in the State Monument List of Ukraine, units
Area of the nature reserve fund of national importance, % of the country area
Status of implementation (development, modernization, improvement) of local automated centralized public alert systems, %
Emissions of air pollutants from stationary sources,% to 2015 level
Number of cities in which the average annual concentrations of major pollutants in the atmospheric air exceed the average daily maximum permissible concentrations, units
Number of workers employed in tourism business entities (CEA code-2010 – 55.1, 55.2, 55.3, 79.11, 79.12), persons

goal.title: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

indicators.title: Resource intensity of GDP (ratio of consumed volumes of natural resources, waste generated and pollutant emissions to GDP), % to 2015 level
Share of post-harvest losses in the total production of cereals, %
Share of post-harvest losses in overall production of vegetables and melons, %
Share of enterprises that implemented chemical management systems in accordance with international standards in the total number of enterprises using hazardous chemicals, %
Volume of waste generated by all economic activities per unit of GDP, kg per USD 1,000 PPP in 2011
Share of burned and recycled waste in the total waste generated, %

goal.title: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

indicators.title: Ratio of GHG emissions to 1990 level, %

goal.title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

indicators.title: Share of discharges of polluted wastewater in total discharges in the marine environment, %
Area of territories and objects of the natural reserve fund of coastal regions, % of the territory of coastal areas
Area of territories and objects of the natural reserve fund in the Black and Azov Seas, thousands of hectares
Volumes of extraction of aquatic bioresources in the exclusive (maritime) economic zone of Ukraine, thousands of tonnes

goal.title: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

indicators.title: Area of territories and objects of the natural reserve fund, thousands of hectares
Share of area of territories and objects of the natural reserve fund in the total area of the country, %
Share of the area of the national environmental network in the total area of the country, %
Forested territory of the country, %
Wood stock in forests, millions of cubic metres

Setting and implementation of a voluntary national objective to achieve a neutral level of land degradation in the activity area ‘Maintaining organic matter (humus) content in soils’ (organic carbon (humus) content in agricultural soils (%)) (data from international sources and organizations may be additionally used)
Amount of arable land, thousands of hectares
Share of arable land in total area of the country, %
Area of land used for organic production, thousands of hectares
Area of agricultural land of extensive use (hayfields, pastures), thousands of hectares
Share of area of agricultural land of extensive use (hayfields, pastures) in total area of the country, %
Area of the nature reserve fund in mountainous regions, thousands of hectares
Share of the area of the nature reserve fund in mountainous regions in the total area of the country, %

goal.title: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

indicators.title: Number of criminal offenses under Articles 115–118, 121 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (evident intentional homicide, intentional grievous bodily harm) reported in the past 12 months per 100 000 persons

Number of victims of crimes related to physical violence (intentional homicide (and relevant attempts), rape (and relevant attempts), grievous bodily harm), reported over the past 12 months, per 100 000 persons
Number of victims of rape in the past 12 months, persons
Number of victims of human trafficking or other illicit transactions involving the transfer of human beings reported in the past 12 months, persons
Number of specialists trained in combating human trafficking
Number of social services provided to meet the needs of victims of human trafficking
Number of counter-trafficking information campaigns conducted
Number of persons covered by counter-trafficking information campaigns
Percentage of funding of regional counter-trafficking programs from relevant local budgets
Number of persons who obtained the victim of trafficking status, persons
Level of public confidence in the court, %
Number of persons seeking free legal aid, persons

Share of high-level risks in the overall national aggregate of risks in the system for preventing and counteracting the legalization of illegal incomes, the financing of terrorism and the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction, %
Number of weapons seized (criminal proceedings with completed pre-trial investigation for the past 12 months, units)
Number of ammunition seized (criminal proceedings with completed pre-trial investigation for the past 12 months, units)
Number of criminal offenses related to illicit arms trafficking reported in the past 12 months, units
Primary government expenditures as a proportion of original approved budget, by sector (or by budget codes or similar)

Proportions of positions in national and local institutions, including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions, by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups
Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations

indicators.title: Total government revenue as a proportion of GDP, by source
